snippet: Eric M. Frein, the survivalist charged in a deadly ambush on a Pennsylvania state police barracks stowed guns in an abandoned airplane hangar near where he was captured, according to court documents.
abstract: Court documents say Eric M Frein, survivalist charged in a deadly ambush on a Pennsylvania State Police barracks, stowed guns and other gear in an abandoned airplane hangar near where he was captured after 48 days on the run.
lead_paragraph: Eric M. Frein, the survivalist charged in a deadly ambush on a Pennsylvania state police barracks stowed guns in an abandoned airplane hangar near where he was captured, according to court documents.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Inventory Lists Arsenal Stowed by Suspect in Trooper Attack
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Inventory Lists Arsenal Stowed by Suspect in Trooper Attack
